data.text: @CraigWHoy1 @MGallacherMSP @GeorgeAdam Here we go again Tories throwing their toys out of the pram because the Scottish Government are protecting the people whereas the "Scottish" tories want to follow their Corrupt leader who is trying to save his beck by trying to be popular with the electorate !
